name: BewareWolf
description:
BewareWolf - A game made for TOJam 2014 

Get some friends together and play this fast-paced local multiplayer game of Werewolves vs Villagers!

Made by Dan Cox (art), Whitaker Trebella (audio), and Matt Rix (code).

Let us know what you think! :)

note: can be played up to 6 gamepads and the keyboard
